product_name: Boardworks Kraken Stand Up Paddle Board - 10' 3"
long_description: The Kraken paddle board has a pulled-in nose and tail design for excellent performance in surf, and a little extra width that provides incredible stability for paddlers of all sizes and abilities.
short_description: The Kraken paddle board has a pulled-in nose and tail design for excellent performance in surf, and a little extra width that provides incredible stability for paddlers of all sizes and abilities.
